metadata.title: USN-6371-1 -- libssh2 vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libssh2 incorrectly handled memory access. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6371-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libssh2-1-dev - 1.4.3-2ubuntu0.2+esm3 libssh2-1 - 1.4.3-2ubuntu0.2+esm3 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
